thread.title: Cathryn
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Cathryn

author: Cathryn
title: Cathryn
text: An outstanding experience. Got new tires with balance/ front and rear alignment done in an amazing 45 minutes. Great, knowledgeable service staff with a very good price on their product overall. These factors will keep me coming back for years to come. Bravo!!
